intro: Burn rubber, break limits, become a Legend!
description:
Unleash the ultimate high-octane experience in Speedway Legends: Overdrive Racing! 
This isn’t just another racing game - it’s a full-throttle test of skill, speed, and style. With a lineup of adrenaline-pumping modes, each race is a chance to etch your name into the asphalt.

*Drift Mode – Slide, glide, and defy physics as you master the art of sideways speed. String together insane drifts, rack up points, and leave a trail of burning rubber behind!

*Circuit Mode – Strategize every turn, overtake rivals with precision.

*Time Attack Mode – The clock is your enemy. Can you push your car to the limit and shave milliseconds off your best lap? Only the fastest survive.

*Overdrive Mechanic – Charge up your Overdrive meter and unleash supercharged speed bursts that bend the laws of physics. Blow past competitors and leave them eating dust!

*Customize & Conquer – Build your ultimate racing machine and prove your dominance.

*Become a Legend – Whether you're drifting, conquering professional circuits, or fighting against time itself, only the best can claim the title of Speedway Legend.

Strap in. Grip the wheel. Overdrive awaits.
